```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
fam <- genio::read_fam("../dat/chr22.fam")
bim <- genio::read_bim("../dat/chr22.bim")
system.time(bed <- genio::read_bed("../dat/chr22.bed", bim$id, fam$id))
```
